channel.title: Hello World on Uncached
channel.description: Recent content in Hello World on Uncached

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Hello! Welcome to my latest attempt to write something meaningful. I am a backend engineer and primarily work on distributed systems. This blog is going to the place where I publish my learnings, findings as an engineer, and stuff I find interesting in general. I have been working with Kubernetes and Go in general, with a mix of JavaScript. I assume I would write about them first, but who knows - TBD!
